reviewText: I remember watching these shows as a kid, they were telling, amazing, funny, and inspiring.  Now as an adult, they're a lot cornier than I remember, but still just as funny.  Bob's so engaging and hilarious in his little quips with the audience, guests, and even the President of the USA.  After watching this DVD I remember why I've always wanted to change my name to Bill, you have to watch it to understand.  I think this is the first time they were called the USO, and because of Hope it's easy to see why they're still around today.
